name: RPOL.net Starry Sky (by request)
description: An RPOL theme with a dark colour scheme. This one has a star-filled sky, with purple and blue gradients characteristic of the aurora borealis. It has black glittery headings on tables and light blue links.
additional_info:
This is the upgraded version, designed to work with the latest version of RPOL (RUBB v. 1.9.54).

Updated on 7/4/13 to give a darker quoted text background, more suited to use with some colours.
